articles.description: We ask 30 BBC Sport football pundits to predict who will win the Premier League title, and which clubs will finish in the top four this season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions 2024-25: BBC Sport pundits pick their top four

articles.description: Kilmarnock and St Mirren are in Norway for the deciding legs of their Conference League third qualifying round ties, with both ties tied at the midway stage.
articles.title: Brann v Kilmarnock & Tromso v St Mirren: Conference League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Nineteen years and 10 miles separated Zambia's football team from a lost, golden generation on a fateful night in Libreville.
articles.title: Zambia: The 1993 air crash and the 2012 Afcon underdogs

articles.description: Arsenal are in talks with Real Sociedad about signing midfielder Mikel Merino, who played in all of Spain's seven games at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Arsenal transfer news: Mikel Merino talks ongoing with Real Sociedad as Gunners target midfielder

articles.description: Laura Woods reveales she received "numerous death threats" after commenting on an article about the eligibility of Olympic champion boxers Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting.
articles.title: Laura Woods receives "numerous death threats" over online comment on Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting article

articles.description: Tottenham suspend Yves Bissouma for the game at Leicester City on Monday after footage appeared to show the midfielder inhaling laughing gas.
articles.title: Tottenham suspend Yves Bissouma for Leicester game after laughing gas video

articles.description: A petition calling for breakdancer Raygun to apologise contains 'falsehoods aimed at inciting hatred against her', says the Australian Olympic Committee.
articles.title: Raygun: Petition calling for Australian breakdancer to apologise criticised by Australian Olympic Committee

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his team are "not ready" for their Friday's Premier League opener against Fulham.
articles.title: Man Utd: Erik ten Hag says team not ready for Fulham opener in Premier League

articles.description: Nottingham Forest manager Nuno Espirito Santo and defender Neco Williams are fined for misconduct by the Football Association after last season's defeat by Everton.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: FA fines Nuno Espirito Santo and Neco Williams for misconduct

articles.description: The Indian cricket board says it will not step in to host the 2024 Women's T20 World Cup if it has to be moved from Bangladesh.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup 2024: India will not step in to host tournament if moved from Bangladesh
